member.name: F:TextSerializer.Attributes.LengthAttribute.CountMode.DecimalsInclusive
member.summary: Decimal places are already counted in the Length

member.name: F:TextSerializer.Attributes.LengthAttribute.CountMode.DecimalsExclusive
member.summary: Decimal places are not counted in the Length Length will be increased to account for it

member.name: T:TextSerializer.Attributes.RegistrySizeAttribute
member.summary: Optional Attribute. Allows class-wide length check

member.name: F:TextSerializer.DataType.N
member.summary: Numeric, shoud be left-padded with zeros

member.name: F:TextSerializer.DataType.C
member.summary: Textual, should be right-padded with spaces
